Traits.Name: Aetherwall
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Traits.Name: Eyes Within Eyes
Traits.Description: Immune to blinded. Simply grows more eyes.

Traits.Name: Lidless Gaze
Traits.Description: At the start of the round, keep track of where the pale man is gazing, a fact that is known to all characters. Its gaze is always fixated on a foe in range 10, and affects a blast 1 area centered on that foe. It must gaze at a different foe each round from the last, if possible. If the foe breaks line of sight, the Pale Man can immediately gaze at a new character as an effect.

Actions.Name: Void Bolt
Actions.Hit: 2[D] and character must save or become vulnerable.
Actions.Effect: Summon a height 1 piece of terrain in the area.

Actions.Name: Fatal Thaum
Actions.Effect: At the end of that character's turn, shoot a bolt of energy at that character, creating a blast 1 area effect centered on them. Deals [D] to that character, destroys all created terrain in the area and shoves all other characters 1 away from that character.

Actions.Name: Annihilate Flesh
Actions.Hit: [D] five times and foe is vulnerable.
Actions.Effect: Reduce the number of times this attack deals damage by [D] for each character or piece of created terrain in the area, to a minimum of [D].
